Shadow to Shadow.name: Shadow to Shadow
Shadow to Shadow.flavor: You slide behind cover, attack your foe from a distance, and then slip back into the shadows again.
Shadow to Shadow.requirement: You must be using a hand crossbow, a repeating crossbow, a shortbow, a shuriken, or a sling.
Shadow to Shadow.effect: Before and after the attack, you shift 3 squares. After each shift, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Leaves of Steel.name: Leaves of Steel
Leaves of Steel.flavor: You slip out of the shadows, firing a volley of shots at your enemies.
Leaves of Steel.requirement: You must be using a hand crossbow, a repeating crossbow, a shortbow, a shuriken, or a sling.
Leaves of Steel.effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.
Leaves of Steel.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Forest Specter.name: Forest Specter
Forest Specter.flavor: Moving among foliage or around a cavern wall, you blend into your surroundings like a spirit of nature.
Forest Specter.requirement: You must have total concealment or superior cover.
Forest Specter.effect: You become invisible until the end of your next turn, until you attack, or until you no longer have any cover or any concealment.
